reference.title: AArch64 behavior
reference.shortdesc: When executing in AArch64 state at a particular Exception level, you can configure the hardware translation table walk to use either the 4KB, 16KB, or 64KB translation granule. Program the Translation Granule bit, TG0, in the appropriate translation control register:

section.p: For TCR_EL1, you can program the Translation Granule bits TG0 and TG1 to configure the translation granule respectively for TTBR0_EL1 and TTBR1_EL1, or TCR_EL2 when VHE is enabled.
